name: A strange world of fantasy
description:
This is a little adventure game. There's something different behind every door you open.



It's an adventure game. When you open your eyes. You're in the old log house. You want to go out and see the outside world. You will be prompted. You don't have a key. Look for the key. Open the door. Explore the outside world!

After opening the door, there is a prompt, please pay attention to it.

Through the time column, you can reach other scenes.

Pick up as many gold coins as you can and pick up an object you see. To complete the final task!

Why are you here? What conspiracy is hidden behind it? Please explore carefully in the game.

Operation mode

Right click the target

WASD motion control

Left mouse button attack

Mouse control direction

E loading weapons
